amendatorysection.chaptername: State Uni., State Colleges, and Post. Education
amendatorysection.catchline: Authority; rules and regulations for use of project; designate agent.
amendatorysection.para: The authority may establish rules and regulations for the use of a project or any portion thereof and designate a private institution of higher education as its agent to establish rules and regulations for the use of a project undertaken by such private institution of higher education.
